Hey there! This was a mini-project of mine from 2017. As you may expect, a lot of the info and links here will be outdated. I've kept the site up for archival purposes. (Contact me here)

Locations

Venue Bookings

Many places - restaurants, hotels, even government buildings - offer their various function/private rooms and halls for rent. Details can be found on their websites or by calling or visiting them.

Venues by Type

A non-comprehensive list:

Sports

  • Government-owned:
    • Bookings through 1-2-Book / Facilities Rental System:
      A number of government-owned facilities including stadium complex venues, and school halls.
    • Jabatan Belia dan Sukan (Terms of Reservation & Use):
      Browse via the website menu under “Prasarana” for venues. Example venue listing: Kompleks Sukan Berakas * Universiti Brunei Darussalam under “Sports and Recreational Facilities”

(I’m not sure of the overlap between 1-2-Book and the venues listed on Jabatan Belia dan Sukan’s website)

  • Privately-owned:
    • Bookings through SPORTSBru (iOS App Store):
      Facebook and Instagram accounts are dead links

Conference/Meetings/Training

  • Government-owned:
    • 1-2-Book - Conference and Meetings
    • Civil Service Institute / Institut Perkhidmatan Awam (IPA)
    • SEAMEO Voctech International House
    • Universiti Brunei Darussalam
  • Privately-owned:
    • Centrepoint Hotel
    • LiveWIRE Centre

Rooms with computers:

  • Universiti Brunei Darussalam under “Computer Services Centre”
Company Poster (click for larger) More info Image source

Social/Family

(Restaurants and cafes are good for these!)

Weddings

  • List of venues popular for weddings, compiled by Concierge of Brunei
  • Rental List, including costs, rental of tents (penyewaan kem), and related services such as aircon, towing, karaoke, Darussyifa. Unknown source or date

(There must be loads of wedding venue lists out there. Please share if you find one!)

Others

  • Government-owned:
    • 1-2-Book - Car Parks

Online bookings

A small number of venues are available through online booking.

  • 1-2-Book / Facilities Rental System (News article):
    Government facilities including school halls, sports venues, and notably, ICC facilities.
  • SPORTSBru (iOS App Store, News article):
    Privately-owned venues. Facebook and Instagram accounts are dead links
